# MarketplaceV3EnglishAuctions.getWinner() method

Get the winner for a specific english auction

## Example

```javascript
// The auction ID of a closed english auction
const auctionId = 0;
const auctionWinner = await contract.englishAuctions.getWinner(auctionId);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
getWinner(auctionId: BigNumberish): Promise<Address>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description    |
| --------- | ------------ | -------------- |
| auctionId | BigNumberish | the auction Id |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Address](./sdk.address.md)&gt;

the address of the auction winner

## Remarks

Get the winner of the auction after an auction ends.
